desc: Tiny Town is a traditional children's boutique specializing in hand-smocked and appliqued outfits. Sizes range from infant to a Girls 12 and a Boys 7. Tiny Town's friendly staff can help you find the perfect outfit for a wedding, Easter, Christmas or just a day at the beach!

layout.text: Founded in 1956, Tiny Town is the oldest and best-known children’s boutique on the Gulf Coast. We carry smocked, applique, and monogrammable outfits for every occasion!
